wikipedia_page.main: Percy Newton (January 1904 – October 1993) was an English footballer. His regular position was at full back. He was born in Whitchurch, Shropshire. He played for Manchester United, Sandbach Ramblers and Tranmere Rovers.

response: * Percy Newton (1904 in Whitchurch–1993), professional footballerMUFC Info.com profile retrieved 20 March 2018
